scripts.validate: cd ./cli && npm run build && (node ./dist/cli validate testdoc ../json-docs/full-test-suite.json & node ./dist/cli validate changelog '../json-docs/CDR Test Documentation CHANGE LOG.json')
scripts.validate-testdoc: cd ./cli && npm run build && node ./dist/cli validate testdoc ../json-docs/full-test-suite.json
scripts.validate-changelog: cd ./cli && npm run build && node ./dist/cli validate changelog '../json-docs/CDR Test Documentation CHANGE LOG.json'
scripts.generate: cd ./cli && (node ./dist/cli generate html ../json-docs/full-test-suite.json ../docs/index.html & node ./dist/cli generate markdown ../json-docs/full-test-suite.json ../docs/ReadMe.md)
